language.title: Việt Nam (VN)- Team XenForum Việt Nam
language.phrase:
In strict mode, if node and thread criteria is specified, a wallpaper will strictly display only in the nodes and threads specified, even if other controllers are specified.

In non-strict mode, if thread and node criteria is specified, the wallpaper will still display only in the selected nodes/threads, but also in other controllers.
Update XenForo Media Gallery View Counters
BB Code for using XenForo Media Gallery media in posts.
Album sort order changed to default
Album add permission changed to followed
Album view permission changed to followed
Album add permission changed to members only
Album view permission changed to members only
Album add permission changed to private
Album view permission changed to private
Album add permission changed to public
Album view permission changed to public
Album add permission changed to shared ({users})
Album view permission changed to shared (Users: {users})
Media item removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Options that control the media gallery add-on.
If enabled, the New/Random Media Block will display media from albums (if the viewing user has permission to view those media and albums).
This globally sets the default album add permission.
The maximum number of albums to show per page
This globally sets the default album view permission.
Allow rotating / flipping of animated images

If enabled, and the imagick PECL extension is installed on the server, an animated GIF will be allowed to be rotated/flipped with its animation retained. If you change this value, you will need to rebuild the thumbnails.

If enabled, and the imagick PECL extension is installed on the server, an animated GIF will be thumbnailed and its animation will be maintained. If you change this value, you will need to rebuild the thumbnails.
If enabled, image titles will be populated automatically with the file name of the uploaded file. If disabled, the image titles will be blank and must be filled in.

If enabled,video titles and descriptions will be populated automatically with data fetched from the provided URL (if available). If disabled, the video titles and descriptions will be blank and the title must be filled in.

Choose one of the category list styles. "Classic" operates like XenForo Media Gallery 1.X.X. "Basic" operates like XenForo Media Gallery 2.0.X. "Collapsible" allows a user to expand or collapse categories, with the "Collapsible Expanded" option functioning the same but with all categories automatically expanded.
In the event that a thumbnail image could not be obtained, the following thumbnail will be used instead.
Use this to specify which EXIF parameters should be fetched during photo uploads.

Use this setting to control where Font Awesome is called. By default, Font Awesome is loaded on every page. You can choose to not load it at all (in which case you will have missing icons unless it is loaded elsewhere in your style).
Show Recent Media on Forum List
If enabled, the recent media list will show on the forum list.

If you choose "Media Only" only the media will be displayed. If you choose "Simple" the media will be displayed with its title. If you choose "Extended" the media will be displayed in posts with additional tabs containing various media information.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. Use spaces or line break between extensions. This list applies globally to all users and cannot be overridden per user/usergroup.
The maximum number of comments to show per page.
Only show media added within the last X days (Media Home):

If you have a large gallery, your media home page may load slowly. This option will mitigate that to only show media on the media home page from the last X days. Older media is still discoverable via albums, categories and search. Set to 0 for unlimited.
Max number of media items (per page)
The maximum number of media items to show per page.
The media sites you choose here can be used to embed media into the gallery.

Above you can configure where the thumbnails for each media site should be pulled from. If a site isn't configured with a thumbnail, a placeholder image will be used instead. For each media site you can configure a thumbnail URL (use {$id} as a placeholder). Or you can provide a class name if some more advanced code is required to get the thumbnail.
The style selected here will be displayed on all Gallery pages instead of the default style.
Choose the categories you wish to pull media from on the New/Random Media Block.
This number of media items will show in the block.
Either show the most recent media or a random selection
Enable [xfr] User Albums => XenForo Media Gallery Redirection
Enter the name of the import log table you saved when you completed the import. Remember to disable or uninstall the add-on once you have activated redirection.
Enable [8wayRun.Com] XenMedio => XenForo Media Gallery Redirection
Enter the name of the import log table you saved when you completed the import. Remember to disable or uninstall the add-on once you have activated redirection.
Require comment when rating media or album
If checked then all users who wish to rate an album or media item will be required to also write a comment.
Show how many albums in the Recent Albums block in the Gallery sidebar?
Show how many comments in the recent comments block in the Gallery sidebar?
Which locations do you want to display the Gallery Statistics block?
Show how many tags in the tag cloud block in the Gallery sidebar?
Show how many top contributors in the recent comments block in the Gallery sidebar?
What page should the Media navigation tab link to?

The value here must be a valid phrase in each visitor's language and changing this value will change the word used on the navigation tab from the default "Media" to another one of your choosing. e.g. "home" would change the tab to read "Home".

Changing this option will allow you to adjust the general position of the navigation tab. For finer tuning, you may need to adjust the display order of the XenForo Media Gallery navigation_tab in Code Event Listeners.
Enable member tag approval and delete rejected/pending requests after X days:

Depending on permissions, your members may be allowed to tag others. If this option is enabled, those tags will be subject to the approval of the person being tagged. The person being tagged will receive an alert asking them to approve or reject the request. Pending or rejected requests will be pruned after X days.
How many tags should be shown on the tags page? If set to 0 then all tags will be shown (where the use_count is greater than zero).
When uploading an image, a thumbnail is created based on these dimensions. If you change this value, you will need to rebuild the thumbnails.
When an album is created or updated, this number of media items will be cached and used as a thumbnail for the album.
Enable unviewed media count and cache for X minutes:
If enabled, your members will see a counter above the "Media" tab indicating how many media items there are that haven't yet been viewed.
If enabled, an animated GIF will be watermarked.

These are the maximum dimensions for the watermark as a percentage width/height of the original image. The original aspect ratio of the watermark is kept, so the end result is the watermark may be smaller than specified here. This change is not retroactive so you will need to rebuild the watermarks for changes to take effect.
The horizontal and vertical margin in pixels
Set the opacity of your watermark. 100 is opaque.
XenForo Media Gallery Album Moderator Permissions
XenForo Media Gallery Comment Moderator Permissions
XenForo Media Gallery General Media Quotas
XenForo Media Gallery Image Media Quotas
XenForo Media Gallery Media Moderator Permissions
XenForo Media Gallery User Tagging Permissions
XenForo Media Gallery Watermark Moderator Permissions
Add watermark to existing (un-watermarked) media by self
Add watermark to existing (un-watermarked) media by anyone
Set thumbnail on album by self
Set thumbnail on album by anyone
Set avatar from media added by self
Set avatar from media added by anyone
Bypass approval when creating tags of others
Bypass moderation queue when posting a comment
Bypass moderation queue when adding media
Change add permission of album by self
Change add permission of album by anyone
Change view permission of album by self
Change view permission of album by anyone
Set custom order on album by self
Set custom order on album by anyone
Delete member tags from media by self
Delete member tags from media by anyone
Delete tag of yourself in media by anyone
Time limit on editing/deleting own comments (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own media (minutes)
Edit tags and fields on media by self
Edit tags and fields on media by anyone
Edit video embed URL of media by self
Edit video embed URL of media by anyone
Maximum number of tags per media
Move media by self to any category / own album
Move media by anyone to any category / own album
Remove watermark from existing (watermarked) media by self
Remove watermark from existing (watermarked) media by anyone
Tag members in media by self
Tag members in media by anyone
Tag yourself in media by anyone
Set thumbnail on media by self
Set thumbnail on media by anyone
Controls basic category sidebar functions such as the width.
The default number of items to display per row on Gallery pages. This helps define the percentage width of each item container.
Style properties for the forum list new media block
Some settings to adjust for responsive design.
Various style properties for XenForo Media Gallery
Style properties for XenForo Media Gallery thumbnails
XFMG - Message and Member Card Elements
Style properties for message user info and member card display
The number of items to display per row on Gallery pages when responsive design is at the "medium" width or below. This helps define the percentage width of each item container.
The number of items to display per row on Gallery pages when responsive design is at the "narrow" width or below. This helps define the percentage width of each item container.
The number of items to display per row on Gallery pages when responsive design is at the "wide" width or below. This helps define the percentage width of each item container.
This field must contain two comma separated values. The first value is the maximum page width. The second value is the number of slides to be displayed at that width.
This field must contain two comma separated values. The first value is the maximum page width. The second value is the number of slides to be displayed at that width.
This field must contain two comma separated values. The first value is the maximum page width. The second value is the number of slides to be displayed at that width.
If enabled, the media title will display on hover. On a touch device, this is automatically forced to show (if enabled). If disabled, no media title is shown.

If enabled you can click left/right to navigate through the block. If disabled, the navigation will not show, but the block can be navigated by clicking and dragging. Navigation never shows on touch devices.
By default, the media information overlay is only visible on hover (or permanently on touch devices). To make the information overlay always visible, enable this option.

If enabled, while hovering over a thumbnail (or using a touch device), a small overlay is displayed that contains extra information such as the uploader, category/album name, and average rating. These details can be toggled on/off below.
Enable media information overlay on hover
This defines the individual items in the responsive container. This enables you to adjust or override the number of items that appear per row on pages without a sidebar (the Find New Media page).

This defines the individual items in the responsive container. This enables you to adjust or override the number of items that appear per row. Forcing a fixed pixel width will allow a dynamic number of items per row, similar to XenForo Media Gallery 1.x.
This is the fluid container that wraps around the responsive elements of media items on the media index pages. The settings here can be useful to mitigate oversized thumbnails on large displays.
Display link to the user's albums page on the member card.
Show link to albums page on user's member card
Display the total number of albums added to the gallery by the message author.
Show author album count on messages
Display link to the user's media page on the member card.
Show link to media page on user's member card
Display the total number of media items added to the gallery by the message author.
Show author media count on messages
This is the width of each slide in the slider. The slides may not be exactly this width due to responsive design resizing them dynamically.
Displays whether the media item is in a category or an album.
Requires "Enable media information overlay on hover" to be enabled.
Display avatar on media info overlay
Requires "Enable media information overlay on hover" to be enabled.
Display media category/album on media info overlay
Displays a count of the number of comments made for the media item.
Displays the date a media item was added, or the date an album was last updated.
If selected, the media item or album description will be displayed.
Displays the number of likes an album or media item has received.
Displays a link which opens the media item in the lightbox.
Requires "Enable media information overlay on hover" to be enabled.
Display rating average on media info overlay
Displays the number of ratings an album or media item has received.
If selected, the media item or album title will be displayed.
In the case of media items, the type of media (image or video) is displayed. For albums, the privacy of the album is displayed.
Requires "Enable media information overlay on hover" to be enabled.
Display media username on media info overlay
Displays the number of views an album or media item has had.
This media by {name} has been removed from view.
{name} liked your comment on the album {title}
{name} liked your comment on the media {title}
{name} liked your media {title} in the album {album}
{name} liked your media {title} in the category {category}
{name} rated album {title} with a rating of {rating}
{name} rated media {title} with a rating of {rating}
{name} rated your album {title} with a rating of {rating}
{name} rated your media {title} with a rating of {rating}
A comment is required with this rating.
Your album has been created successfully.
Album has been removed from public view.
You do not have permission to like albums.
An album owner cannot share an album with themselves.
Album pictures appear to be stored in the file system. Please confirm the correct path.
All albums shared by other users with you.
This is a collection of all the albums that you are watching.
This is a collection of all the media items that you are watching.
An unexpected error occurred during cropping.
An unexpected error occurred while uploading the file:
and your album has been created
To import media from {product}, you need to provide the name of the import log table which you created after completing your forum import.
Automatically watch albums that you create or when you comment
Automatically watch categories that you add media to
Automatically watch media that you add or when you comment
The Gallery Statistics must be cached periodically. This happens by default around once an hour. To increase this, change the above value (hours).
You cannot bypass watermarking for this media.
You cannot change the share settings of an album that is "public" or "private".

The usergroups selected here can view this category, and media within this category. The view permissions must be explicitly defined for each category. Preventing access to a parent category, will not stop a user from viewing one of its child categories.
Check the media items you want to feature in the album thumbnail. You may also drag to change the order.
Check out all albums created by {user}
Check out all media tagged with tag: {tag}
Check out all media uploaded by {user}
Choose a category to continue adding media
You can choose a different category if required
The database details from where {name} will be imported from are detailed below. These are taken from the XenForo config.php.
Click to automatically generate a title
The time limit to delete this comment ({minutes} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to edit this comment ({minutes} minutes) has expired.

The usergroups selected here can add media to this category. If no usergroups are selected then the category will become a container only and its category page will display media from all child categories
Content tags will always be removed upon deletion.
Please confirm that you wish to crop the media to the selected area. This action cannot be undone!
Cropping Activated... Click and drag over image to crop.
Watch albums when creating or commenting
Watch media when adding or commenting
Display unviewed media count above navigation tab
Drag media items to rearrange them within this album or choose one of the presets.
To embed a video, paste a link from one of our approved media sites.
Note: EXIF data is stored on valid file types when a photo is uploaded. The photo may have been manipulated since upload (rotated, flipped, cropped etc).
Flash fired, compulsory flash mode, return light not detected.
Flash fired, compulsory flash mode, return light detected.
Flash did not fire, compulsory flash mode.
Flash did not fire, auto mode.
Flash fired, auto mode, return light not detected.
Flash fired, auto mode, return light detected.
Flash fired, red-eye reduction mode, return light not detected.
Flash fired, red-eye reduction mode, return light detected.
Flash fired, compulsory flash mode, red-eye reduction mode.
Flash fired, compulsory flash mode, red-eye reduction mode, return light not detected.
Flash fired, compulsory flash mode, red-eye reduction mode, return light detected.
Flash fired, auto mode, red-eye reduction mode.
Flash fired, auto mode, return light not detected, red-eye reduction mode.
Flash fired, auto mode, return light detected, red-eye reduction mode.
FFmpeg cannot be found at the specified path. Please check path and try again.
Field can be used in albums
Enter a caption for this media. You may use BB Code.
Files added by URL must be valid images.
Only those members who are "followed" by the album owner will be able to add media.
The members that you follow automatically have access to view the media within this album.
The following members were not found when setting add permissions: {members}
The following members were not found when setting view permissions: {members}
Existing content has been detected in the gallery. The gallery must be empty before proceeding with the import.
Give each media item a title and description to continue
[IMG] BB Code with Thumbnail copied successfully

With [xfr] User Albums it is possible to create "global" albums which are public albums that can have content uploaded to by anyone. This is similar to XenForo Media Gallery categories.

If you enable this option, the global albums will be imported as site categories (with no parent and high display order). You may need to re-arrange these as desired after the import is completed.

If you disable this option, the global albums will be imported as public albums and attributed to the original owner.
Import log could not be found for add-on {addon}

You have selected to retain IDs. The XenForo importer system will automatically remove forum with node_id 2 and category with node_id 1. Only proceed if you wish for that forum and category to be deleted or they no longer exist.
Include notifications for media added to sub-categories
If you wish to leave a comment with this rating, enter a message above. The rating and comment will be displayed publicly.
The media could not be loaded.
The maximum allowed dimensions for images (width x height). Use 0 or blank to not restrict dimensions. If an image exceeds the specified dimensions, it will be resized automatically.
Provide the maximum media file size in megabytes (MB). Media over this size will be rejected.
Use 0 to allow an unlimited number of media items per upload.
Specify the maximum amount of disk space in megabytes (MB) that can be used by each user. 0 is unlimited.
This media cannot currently be downloaded
Media is being shown from all child categories.
The time limit to delete this media ({minutes} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to edit this media ({minutes} minutes) has expired.
Media has been removed from public view.
Media has been saved, but is awaiting approval by moderators
Media is part of an album which has been removed from public view.
Media site thumbnail URL pattern or class name
You are only allowed to tag a maximum of {limit} users per media item.
Use the above checkboxes to restrict categories to certain media types
Registered members who have permission to view the gallery and albums in general will be able to add media.
A members only album is fully visible by anyone who is a registered member of the site.
Any registered member can add media to this album.
This album and its contents can only be seen by registered members of this site.
Members who have liked comment by {user}
New comment added to the watched album {albumtitle}.
New comment added to watched media {mediatitle}
New Media (if no new media, then Album Home)
New Media (if no new media, then Media Home)
New media {mediatitle} added to the watched album {albumtitle}
New media {mediatitle} added to the watched category {categorytitle}
You do not have permission to add media.
You do not have permission to create an album.
You do not have permission to upload images to this album.
You do not have permission to embed video in this album.
You do not have permission to view albums.
The album will still be listed on the watched albums page, which can be used to list only the albums you're interested in.
You do not have permission to watch this album.
No albums have been created yet.
No albums have been created yet. Create Album.
No albums have been shared with you yet.
You do not have permission to set this media as your avatar.
You do not have permission to edit this media's caption.
There are currently no categories to display. Please bear with us while we add new categories.
The category will still be listed on the watched categories page, which can be used to list only the categories you're interested in.
You do not have permission to watch this category.
You do not have permission to change the order of media within this album.
You do not have permission to change the privacy on this album.
You do not have permission to change the thumbnail.
You do not have permission to crop this media.
No custom gallery fields have been defined.
You do not have permission to delete this album.
You do not have permission to delete this comment.
You do not have permission to delete this media.
You do not have permission to delete tags for this media.
You do not have permission to download this media.
You do not have permission to edit this album.
You do not have permission to edit this comment.
You do not have permission to edit this media.
You do not have permission to edit the embed URL for this media.
You do not have permission to flip media.
You do not have permission to like media.
No media found at the URL provided.
No media has been added yet.
No media has been added yet. Add Media.
No media has been tagged with "{tagname}" or no viewable media found with this tag.
The media will still be listed on the watched media page, which can be used to list only the media items you're interested in.
You do not have permission to watch this media item.
You do not have permission to move this media.
No one has liked this album yet.
No one has liked this comment yet.
No one has liked this media yet.
You do not have permission to view media within this album.
You do not have permission to view media within this category.
You cannot rate your own albums. That's cheating!

You cannot rate your own media. That's cheating!
You do not have permission to rate this media.
You do not have permission to rotate media.
You do not have permission to share this album.
You do not have permission to tag media.
No tags have been added yet. To add tags, click the "Edit Tags and Fields" tab on a media item.
You have no unviewed media. You may view all recent media instead.
You do not have permission to view deleted albums.
You do not have permission to view deleted media.
You do not have permission to view media.

It is not possible to move an album on behalf of another user.
Note: When you delete a category, all media within it is deleted too.
This will slow the process down and is only needed if comments are shown in an incorrect order or the comment position numbers are missing.
You are only allowed to tag yourself in this media.
People who may view this album
Only members which are followed by the album owner can add media to this album.
This album and its contents can only be seen by members which are followed by the album owner.

Please specify one or more members to share with.
Only the album owner can add media to this album. Administrators may be able to override this.
Only the album owner can add media to this album.
A private album can only be viewed by you. The album and its contents will not appear anywhere in the gallery (except to you). Administrators may be able to override this privacy setting.
This album and its contents can only be seen by the album owner.
Anyone with permission to view the gallery and albums will be able to add media to this album.
Everyone can add media to this album.
A public album is fully visible by anyone who can view the gallery.
This album and its contents can be seen by everyone.
Photo ratings are stored in the comments table
Older versions of PhotoPost Pro may store photo ratings in the comments table.

Once you have entered a value for the title and/or description click the button to the right of the field to copy the values to the media you have added so far.
To automatically increment a numerical value in your titles, use the placeholder %n. To automatically populate the filename in your titles, use the placeholder %f.

Tag this media with some descriptive keywords. Tags are converted to lowercase with certain characters stripped away. You can separate tags with a comma. Existing tags will display in a drop down as you type.

{receiver}, {replier} added a new comment to an album you are watching at {board}.
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the album {album} at {board} with email notification of new {content}.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this album or disable all emails.
{receiver}, {replier} added media to an album you are watching at {board}.
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category {category} at {board} with email notification of new {content}.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{receiver}, {replier} added media to a category you are watching at {board}.
{receiver}, {replier} added a new comment to media you are watching at {board}.
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the media {media} at {board} with email notification of new {content}.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this media or disable all emails.
Watermark could not be added. Image could be too small, or the image could be an invalid image type (e.g. GIF).

You do not have permission to remove a watermark from this media.
